<a id="AudioListener2D"></a>

# AudioListener2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Overrides the location sounds are heard from.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Once added to the scene tree and enabled using [make_current()](AudioListener2D.md#AudioListener2D_method_make_current), this node will override the location sounds are heard from. Only one **AudioListener2D** can be current. Using [make_current()](AudioListener2D.md#AudioListener2D_method_make_current) will disable the previous **AudioListener2D**.

If there is no active **AudioListener2D** in the current [Viewport](Viewport.md), center of the screen will be used as a hearing point for the audio. **AudioListener2D** needs to be inside [SceneTree](SceneTree.md) to function.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AudioListener2D_method_clear_current"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_current**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AudioListener2D_method_clear_current)

Disables the **AudioListener2D**. If it's not set as current, this method will have no effect.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioListener2D_method_is_current"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_current**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AudioListener2D_method_is_current)

Returns ``true`` if this **AudioListener2D** is currently active.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioListener2D_method_make_current"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **make_current**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AudioListener2D_method_make_current)

Makes the **AudioListener2D** active, setting it as the hearing point for the sounds. If there is already another active **AudioListener2D**, it will be disabled.

This method will have no effect if the **AudioListener2D** is not added to [SceneTree](SceneTree.md).
